title: Emotion in Motion
description:
The naked soul—getting passionately deep and naked with your soul and mind.

Open-minded mindfulness—exploring the change in mindsets required and the relationship with evolving consciousness in our world. The show includes options for coping and learning how to expand your own consciousness. We discuss, coach and chat with you, the audience, and various leaders of change where change has been embraced and is prevalent and working well. Uncovering and sharing the many varied ways and means for improving inner balance and joy, and creating authenticity in our inner lives.

Experience the ultimate marriage of your mind, heart and soul—it's your destiny.
